attributes.action: Introduce rules to regulate material & claims made in any election / referendum
attributes.background: Currently there are no powers to regulate or enforce campaign material, and holding people to account for false information being used. We require law / legislation to be passed to stop this happening, and introduce a regulator to oversee campaign material.

rejection.details:
This petition has been rejected because we think its similar to this petition which are already been started: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139800 

You might want to consider supporting this petition instead.
